ANU.name: Claudia Slimings
expertise: Medicine Nursing And Health Curriculum And Pedagogy
interest: I have 20 years applied epidemiological research experience and have been involved in a range of studies – from understanding the epidemiology of hospital-acquired C.difficile infection; examining life-course influences on adult health, particularly employment characteristics and mental and cardiovascular health, and long term influences of perinatal and early life determinants; to rural health. I have co-authored 35 publications in peer-reviewed journals which have been cited more than 2500 times (h-index 25, Google Scholar), and co-edited one book on spatial and social disparities in health.
ANU.biography: Fun fact: I was the 100,000th Fellow of the Higher Education Academy
